author: .paulharris
content: is there a resource anywhere that has summary stats on holesky? For example if i wanted to know the average 'correct head' rate ...

author: m.kalinin
content: Thanks a lot for clarification! On the recent call I heard from <@504202741933932544> that Teku would request sidecars in advance if haven't observed them for some time into the slot, but I could take it wrong

author: tbenr
content: yes, we try to complete the blob_sidecar set into the slot when att due is coming and we haven't received them all, but I don't have a "success rate" in doing this ATM. Moreover teku is not serving blobs until block\blobs are fully imported, increasing the change that the first byroot request failure (not found). I recall there were discussion on this last point, I might be wrong.

author: m.kalinin
content: Would Teku request sidecars in the case when no block is observed?

author: m.kalinin
content: If this is the case then Teku has to run validations against the block header unless the block is around

author: tbenr
content: yes, in that case too. we ask all missing blobs assuming max_blobs_per_block

author: tbenr
content: (and we ask the block too)

author: m.kalinin
content: And you use ByRange in this case as the block root isn't available

author: tbenr
content: no because we do it only if we observed a blobsidecar.. so we get the root from there

author: m.kalinin
content: oh, so you don't blindly request sidecars or block. and would request only when a piece of information that contains the block root is obtained?

author: tbenr
content: yes exactly

author: m.kalinin
content: got it, thank you!

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Pari can give access to these stats.

author: parithosh
content:
Do you remember your credentials for this grafana page?
https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io

I see you have an account on it, but it hasn't been active in a while. I can reset if needed.

Once you get access, the dashboard is here: https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/participation_rates_dashboard/validator-participation-rates-dashboards?orgId=1&refresh=10s&var-network=holesky

Metrics are generated with this tool if you want to see the source: https://github.com/dapplion/beacon-metrics-gazer

author: tbenr
content: qq: I don't recall where it has been discussed but how many clients are serving by root blob_sidecars that has passed gossip validation but not yet fully imported along with the block?
